body_html: libTH.so should already be runnable on non-AVX machines (even if it was built on an AVX2-enabled machine). This is because we enable AVX2 only on specific files/functions which actually have runtime dispatch (if AVX2 is not found, the dispatch falls back to the AVX version, if AVX is not found, the dispatch falls back to SSE version)

This is because we enable AVX2 only on specific files/functions which actually have runtime dispatch (if AVX2 is not found, the dispatch falls back to the AVX version, if AVX is not found, the dispatch falls back to SSE version)
body: libTH.so should already be runnable on non-AVX machines (even if it was built on an AVX2-enabled machine). This is because we enable AVX2 only on specific files/functions which actually have runtime dispatch (if AVX2 is not found, the dispatch falls back to the AVX version, if AVX is not found, the dispatch falls back to SSE version)
